neva-orchestrator.description: Routes GitHub events to the right Neva workflow and enforces safety rules.

issue-triage.description: Analyzes issues and comments; asks questions or proposes an implementation plan.

pr-reviewer.description: Reviews PR context, CI status, conflicts, and leaves actionable comments.

coder-fix.description: Fixes PR review comments by committing to the same PR branch.

post-merge.description: After manual merge, comments on linked issues and closes them.
